content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Oil Extraction System at (17.5,40.5)
- **Pumpjack** at (17.5,40.5) - Extracts crude oil
- **Storage tank** at (21.5,41.5) - Stores crude oil (currently holding 39.37 crude oil)
- Connected by 4 pipes forming PipeGroup (fluid_system=258)

### Power Generation System at (26.5,42.0)
- **Offshore pump** at (-11.5,21.5) - Provides water
- **Boiler** at (26.5,42.0) - Burns coal to heat water (currently has 29 coal)
- **Steam engine** at (29.5,42.5) - Generates 13500 energy from steam
- Connected by 52 pipes forming PipeGroup (fluid_system=249) for water and PipeGroup (fluid_system=259) for steam
- Powered by electricity group (id=182) with 6 small electric poles

## ERROR TIPS

### Power connection issues
- Ensure power poles are properly connected to all electrical devices
- Verify power production meets consumption requirements

### Inventory inspection errors
- Check entity exists and is accessible before attempting to inspect inventory
- Verify correct entity type is being inspected

### Insertion errors
- Check inventory capacity before attempting to insert items
- Boiler can only hold 50 coal - don't attempt to insert more than capacity

### Pipe network errors
- When querying pipe groups, first verify they exist before accessing
- Water pipe system exists (fluid_system=249) but needs to be properly referenced

### General placement errors
- Verify target position is clear before placing new entities
- Ensure proper spacing between entities to allow connections
